solution_line_template: The second competitor jumped one foot farther than the first competitor, for a distance of {first_jump}+{second_more_than_first}=<<{first_jump}+{second_more_than_first}={second_jump}>>{second_jump} feet.

The third competitor jumped two feet shorter than the third competitor, for a distance of {second_jump}-{third_shorter_than_second}=<<{second_jump}-{third_shorter_than_second}={third_jump}>>{third_jump} feet.

And the fourth competitor jumped 3 feet further than the third competitor, for a distance of {third_jump}+{fourth_more_than_third}=<<{third_jump}+{fourth_more_than_third}={fourth_jump}>>{fourth_jump} feet.
